title: Configure affirmation agent for FO-10
description:
## Objective

Set up the affirmation generation agent for FO-10, either by reusing FO-09's agent or creating a FO-10-specific variant with gpt-4o model.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md` — Section: "Affirmation Engine" and "Reuse from FO-09"

## Scope

**Files to create/modify:**
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-10/affirmation-agent.ts` (or reuse FO-09's via import)
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-10/index.ts` — export affirmation agent
- `src/db/seeds/fo-10.ts` — add affirmation agent KV entries if creating new agent

**Key existing code:**
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-09/affirmation-agent.ts` — reference implementation

## Implementation

1. Decide: reuse FO-09 affirmation agent or create FO-10 variant
2. If reusing: export from fo-10/index.ts
3. If creating new: use gpt-4o model, adapt FO-09's prompts, add KV entries
4. Affirmation agent receives `exchanges` array with fixed questions and user answers

## Tests

1. Verify export: `npx tsx -e "import {fo10AffirmationAgent} from './src/mastra/agents/fo-10'; console.log(fo10AffirmationAgent.name);"`
2. If new KV entries added: `npm run db:seed` passes

Do NOT close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: Affirmation agent exports successfully and db:seed passes
closed_reason: Created FO-10 affirmation agent with gpt-4o model. Added affirmation-agent.ts file, updated index.ts to export it, and added KV seed entries (versions.fo-10-affirmation._info.default and versions.fo-10-affirmation._model_name.default). All acceptance criteria pass: agent exports successfully and db:seed completes without errors.
